svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Female labor force participation rates by family benefits public spending,
The labor force participation rate corresponds to the proportion of the population ages 15 and older that is economically active.
Family benefits spending refer to public spending on financial support for families and children, such as child-related cash
transfers, public spending on services, and tax provisions.
